pages.text: Now with more robots!$(p)Kill endermen to get the two portal frame blocks (The upper Weathered Stone and the lower Mossy Stone)$(p)Sandwich a gold block between the two frame blocks and BOOM (literally) portal opens.$(p)There's also a Skill Menu available. If you're into that kind of thing.

Exploring in the Misty World isn't safe on the surface, but is absolutely deadly when you travel below the mist. If you don't have a respirator with some filter coal in it, you won't even live long enough to find out what will kill you down there. Shift+Right-Click the respirator to insert the coal. The mask slot is accessable by a button just above your helmet slot.
